fields.description: If false, the customer must configure this record at the DNS host for Microsoft Online Services to operate correctly with the domain.
fields.name: IsOptional

fields.description: Value used when configuring the name of the DNS record at the DNS host.
fields.name: Label

fields.description: Indicates what type of DNS record this entity represents. The value can be CName, Mx, Srv, or Txt.
fields.name: RecordType

fields.description: Microsoft Online Service or feature that has a dependency on this DNS record. Can be one of the following values: null, Email, Sharepoint, EmailInternalRelayOnly, OfficeCommunicationsOnline, SharePointDefaultDomain, FullRedelegation, SharePointPublic, OrgIdAuthentication, Yammer, Intune.
fields.name: SupportedService

fields.description: Value to use when configuring the time-to-live (ttl) property of the DNS record at the DNS host. Not nullable.
fields.name: Ttl
